mapper.sql: select t.ARRANGE_ID as arrangeId ,t.CLASS_ID as classId,g.NAME as gradeName,a.SEQ as classSeq, t.YEAR_ID as yearId,t.TERM_ID as termId,t.PERIOD_ID as periodId,t.WEEK_DAY as weekdayId,t.SUBJECT_ID as subjectId ,f.`NAME` as subjectName, t.OTHER_LESSON as otherLesson,t.SOURCE_TYPE as sourceType from t_lesson_arrange t left join t_school_class a on t.CLASS_ID = a.CLASS_ID left join t_school_year b on t.year_id = b.year_id left join t_term c on t.term_id = c.TERM_ID left join t_lesson_period d on t.PERIOD_ID=d.PERIOD_ID left join t_weekday e on t.WEEK_DAY=e.SEQ left join t_subject f on t.SUBJECT_ID = f.SUBJECT_ID left join t_grade g on a.GRADE_ID=g.GRADE_ID
